title: FT:  Tinker bat on Old Mill SGC 20
author: t206fix

posts.post_title: FT:  Tinker bat on Old Mill SGC 20
posts.post_content:
FT:  Tinker bat on SGC 20

I'm looking to pick up a Tinker bat off or Tinker hands on knees with a non SC/Pied back (unless P42, haha).  Of course if the difference in cards requires some cash, then we can talk.  

This front back/combo seems to be lower in population - PSA 6 & SGC 4

Great looking card - thought it would grade for higher but there is a little mark on Joe's knuckle.  It looks like a divot - also some slight wrinkle marks in the shoulder area.
